title: [Medicine] After analyzing 294 anti-SARS-CoV2 antibodies researchers found that IGHV3-53 antibodies show high potency, which is promising for vaccine design. Knowledge of these structural motifs and binding mode should facilitate design of antigens that elicit this type of neutralizing response
[Epidemiology] Common Molecular Feature of Antibodies That Neutralize SARS-CoV-2 Discovered, Boosting COVID-19 Vaccine Prospects
